snippet: In a fresh blow to public confidence, a reactor in southern Japan went into automatic shutdown on Tuesday because of problems with its cooling system.
lead_paragraph: In a fresh blow to public confidence, a reactor in southern Japan went into automatic shutdown on Tuesday because of problems with its cooling system.

headline.main: Cooling Problem Shuts Nuclear Reactor in Japan
headline.print_headline: Japanese Nuclear Plant Shuts Down After Cooling Problem
headline.seo: Genkai Nuclear Plant Shuts Down in Japan
